Symptoms: Feelings of sadness, tearfulness, emptiness or hopelessness
Label: Depression

Symptoms: Angry outbursts, irritability or frustration, even over small matters
Label: Depression

Symptoms: Loss of interest or pleasure in most or all normal activities, such as sex, hobbies or sports
Label: Depression

Symptoms: Sleep disturbances, including insomnia or sleeping too much
Label: Depression

Symptoms: Tiredness and lack of energy, so even small tasks take extra effort
Label: Depression

Symptoms: Reduced appetite and weight loss or increased cravings for food and weight gain
Label: Depression

Symptoms: Anxiety, agitation or restlessness
Label: Depression

Symptoms: Slowed thinking, speaking or body movements
Label: Depression

Symptoms: Feelings of worthlessness or guilt, fixating on past failures or self-blame
Label: Depression

Symptoms: Trouble thinking, concentrating, making decisions and remembering things
Label: Depression

Symptoms: Frequent or recurrent thoughts of death, suicidal thoughts, suicide attempts or suicide
Label: Depression

Label: Depression

Label: Depression

Label: Depression

Label: Depression

Label: Depression

Label: Depression

Label: Depression

Label: Depression
